body: About the Role:  We are looking for a highly organized and detail-oriented colleague with strong written and verbal communications skills who will be supporting the entire HR department. Key Activities•	Assist with day to day operations of the HR functions and duties•	Provide secretarial and administrative support on HR department operations•	Process documentation and prepare reports relating to personnel activities •	Prepare, maintain and update employee personnel files•	Work with new hires to collect necessary paperwork•	Create and distribute documents to employees•	Compile and update employee records (hard and soft copies)•	Schedule interviews and welcome candidatesDesired Skills and Experience•	Strong organizational skills•	Persistent and solid attitude in attention-to-detail•	Strong written and verbal communications skills in both Romanian and English•	Computer literacy (Word, Excel, Outlook)Our Offer-	A job where every day is different and you will develop your skills and potential-	An attractive salary along with meal tickets-	Medical Services Package-	Professional and friendly working environment
title: Human Resources Assistant
locations: Str. Copilului Nr. 22 Sector 1, București, Municipiul București, România
